intro: Dialium silvestre, commonly known as wild African plum, is a tropical tree native to Africa. It belongs to the Malvaceae family and is characterized by its large, heart-shaped leaves and showy yellow flowers. The plant produces edible fruits that are often used in traditional medicine and cuisine. Its bark and leaves are also utilized for their medicinal properties. Dialium silvestre thrives in humid, tropical climates and is often found in forested areas.
